fractals.name: Sierpinski Triangle
fractals.description: A classic fractal formed by repeatedly moving halfway toward a randomly chosen vertex of a triangle.

fractals.name: Chaos Game - Square
fractals.description: Instead of a triangle, we choose from four vertices of a square and move halfway each time.

fractals.name: Barnsley Fern
fractals.description: A fractal that resembles a natural fern, generated using four affine transformations with specific probabilities.
